parse.title: The Children of Húrin, Op. 48 (Vocal Score)

wikitext.*:
[[File:Hurin Vocal Score Artwork.png|thumb|Artwork from the Vocal Score by permission of Ted Nasmith.]]
Published by Zarathustra Music in 2020, the complete Vocal Score of [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]'s ''[[The Children of Húrin, Op. 48 (Opera)]]'' updated to reflect amendments made during the production of Volante Opera Production's Demo Recording of the work.

This is a 116 page A4 sized book with full gloss covers.

This is a complete piano reduction of the score with introduction by the composer and synopsis.

Cover Illustration: TED NASMITH ©2020 “The Slaying of Glaurung"
[[Category:Music books]]
